infos.info: When Ben Bernie became ill, his show became ';Keep The Home Fires Burning'; according to 3/21/1943 issue of the Chicago Daily Tribune (see news clip). The new title first appears in the radio listings of the Chicago Daily Tribune on 2/18/1943. The old title isn't changed in the New York Times radio listings until March 9 but the new title is not mentioned. The Los Angeles uses the new title starting on March 1. - Ben Bernie was to eventually die of this illness on October 20, 1943.
